column4: anybody know about the xubuntu installer crashing pre-install?
It's crashed on verifying
It's a Python ValueError about arch
I don't want to commit to ubuntu on that PC
the CD drive is slow and it has low ram
it's happened a different PC with the same variant of onboard GFX
so this is not specific to my PC
i also don't want to burn a disc, and partition: I just need to test out an installed environment without partitioning: and this is what wubi should be letting me do
Do you have a USB thumbdrive? You could try it that way. Or Virtualbox
how old is the computer
hmmm. Do you have a spare HD you could swap in it? :D
hmmm tricky situation
Are you sure that its not listing your thumbdrive under the hard drives of the BIOS?
I actually do want to install to the HD, just not as a partition, but loopback disk image
I had a laptop from 2001 that listed a thumbdrive as a hard drive so thats how I had to boot it
I know but if you can boot off the thumbdrive then you could install xubuntu to the thumbdrive
are you running windows xp?
system specs?
what exactly happens when you try and install it via wubi?
I'm afraid your hardware just might not let you
good choice, If it doesn't work well you might want to try Lubuntu
